item.title: We have just released our private beta
item.description: v1.0-beta is out We have been working very hard since the last release to deliver as much value as possible. So I proudly announce that our private beta is up and running. You need an invite to sign up, so if you don’t have but want one: Request Invite In this release, we delivered the following: Rebranding Our original intention was to create a whiteboard that makes people’s life easier by its superior UI.
